greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=0; for n>1: a(n)=a(n-1)-n if that number is nonnegative and occurs at most once in the sequence, otherwise a(n)=a(n-1)+n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to Recamán's sequence.
program: | x <= y && (length $ filter (== z) ys) <= 1 = z : f xs (z : ys)
| otherwise = (x + y) : f xs ((x + y) : ys)  where z = y - x
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 03 2003
